name: SpecRunReportHtmlToXml
short_description:
Converts SpecRun html report to xml *like* test results report. (1.9.0 Specflow with SpecRun 1.0.0)

SpecRunReportHtmlToXml.exe {dll_path} {input_file_path} {output_file_path}

dll_path = name that appears in the report
input_file_path = input SpecRun html file
output_file_path = output testResult *like* xml file

Note: paths are absolute

Power users of SpecRun can produce their own .cshtml file to generate a similar file. When it's available this exe will no longer be required.

Simply unzip the file and run the exe. The user will be required to have .Net installed.
